definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to go upstream/to trace the source

sentences.english: Of course, there are problems with backtesting.
sentences.chinese: 当然，还存在着回溯测试的问题。

sentences.english: Backtracking line search is carried out when the trust region trail step fails.
sentences.chinese: 当信赖域试探步失败时我们进行回溯线搜索。

sentences.english: This next example shows how backtracking works with repetition quantifiers.
sentences.chinese: 下一个例子显示了带重复量词的回溯。

sentences.english: Lookback is a term now widely used in blood banking circles.
sentences.chinese: 回溯是现在在血库界广泛使用的术语。

sentences.english: So let me roll the clock back to medieval England.
sentences.chinese: 所以，让我回溯到中世纪的英国。

sentences.english: This goes to the ancient gods called the Zep Tepi.
sentences.chinese: 这要回溯到称为乍帕泰比的古代众神。

sentences.english: The backtracking itself is a good approach for obtaining all the possible solutions.
sentences.chinese: 回溯本身是一种获得目标所有可能解的良好方法。

sentences.english: It goes back to Plato and even before him.
sentences.chinese: 一路回溯到柏拉图，甚至更早以前。

sentences.english: And to discover this we need to journey back to the Victorian era.
sentences.chinese: 要探究这个问题，我们要回溯到维多利亚时代。

sentences.english: Back then, fears of a second Depression were widespread.
sentences.chinese: 回溯往昔，人们曾普遍对第二次经济大萧条感到恐惧。

sentences.english: The engine will discard all backtracking positions.
sentences.chinese: 引擎会忽略所有的回溯位置。

sentences.english: Without any argument, it does a traceback for all processes.
sentences.chinese: 若不带任何参数，它就对所有进程执行回溯。

sentences.english: The self-involvements of subjects influence the accuracy of temporal order and temporal locus memory.
sentences.chinese: 时序和时点的回溯回忆受被试的自我卷入程度的影响。

sentences.english: According to the cause-effect theory and what it goes in practice, the pattern of the back reasoning can be formed.
sentences.chinese: 根据这一原理可以给出回溯推理的正确模式。

sentences.english: For example, go back to the Hakka eight tones.
Could not generate a backtrace as the debugger '%1' was not found.
sentences.chinese: 无法生成回溯跟踪，因为找不到调试器“%1”。

definition: lit. to go upstream/to trace sth back to/to date from
time and place/world of a particular locale and era/(physics) space-time
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to trace sth back to its origin
to demand payment/to extort/to trace/to seek/to pursue/to explore
a re-examination/to have another look at sth
arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
